SELECT du.id AS userId, du.nickname AS nickname, da.authority_level AS authorityLevel, da.remark AS remark, dp.status AS status FROM d_user du, d_authority da LEFT JOIN d_player dp ON da.user_id = dp.user_id AND dp.status != 9 WHERE du.id = da.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO d_authority( user_id, create_time ) VALUES( #{userId}, NOW() )
